reviews.text: No gluten beer, and in itâs class not so bad. Maybe only the price is not good, because one can buy much better liquid for that money. It is more than possible to drink it.
Bottle 0.5l from Silba Island Croatia.Pour it yellow weizen blurry color.Also creamy beer.Citrus on the nose. Taste of citrus, yeast and little bit peach.Nice but nothing special

Bottle 0.5l at tderoeck place. Thank you Tim & Marina for wonderful dinner and great time.Pour it dark brown color with medium white head.On the nose banana.Taste and aroma of banana, spices, dark fruits, little bit caramel and chewing gum.Good balanced.Interesting
